Scripts.OnLoad:
self.RaceID:SetText(self:GetID()) self.RaceID:SetShown(IsDevClient())
if not CharacterCreate.raceButtons then CharacterCreate.raceButtons = {} end
CharacterCreate.raceButtons[self:GetID()] = self

self.ClassID:SetText(self:GetID()) self.ClassID:SetShown(IsDevClient())
if not CharacterCreate.classButtons then CharacterCreate.classButtons = {} end
CharacterCreate.classButtons[self:GetID()] = self

Scripts.OnUpdateModel:
if self.stressTest then if self.ebala == 0 then CharCreateMaleButton:Click() self.ebala = 1 else CharCreateFemaleButton:Click() self.ebala = 0 end
self.raceButtons[math.random(1, #self.raceButtons)]:Click() self.classButtons[math.random(1, #self.classButtons)]:Click() end
